title: make images in <label> clickable
body: when click  images in a <label>, can't change radio button that target of the label. other PC browsers allow to click  these images. only IE,I found.

comments.body: This is an ideal suggestion to file in our new issue tracker as it is more about changing existing behaviour than adding a new feature or web standard. https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/new/
